import React, {Component} from 'react' import ToyslandService from '../../services/ToyslandService' import { WithAuthConsumer } from '../context/AuthContext' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' class SingleProduct extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { product: {}, error: false, loading: false, } } componentDidMount() { ToyslandService.getThisProduct(this.props.match.params.id) .then(product => { this.setState({product}, () => console.log(this.state.product)) }) } handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() this.setState({loading: true, error: false}, () => ToyslandService.createLike(this.props.currentUser.id, this.state.product.id) .then((like) => { // Siempre devuelve lo que devuelve el back console.log(like) }) .catch(() => { this.setState({error: true, loading: false}) }) ) } handle render() { return(
{this.state.product.name}
{this.state.product.category}
{this.state.product.user && this.state.product.user.username}
{this.state.product.price}â‚¬
{this.state.product.name}
{this.state.product.description}
{this.state.product.createdAt}
) } } export default WithAuthConsumer (SingleProduct)
